Title: Steven's Birthday
Writer: Rebecca Sugar (creator), Matt Burnett (story), Ben Levin (story), Rebecca Sugar (story), Ian Jones-Quartey (story), Kat Morris (story), Lamar Abrams, Katie Mitroff
Actors: Zach Callison, Michaela Dietz, Estelle, Deedee Magno
Plot: Steven has a birthday party out at the barn, and decides he has some growing up to do.
